## Conditions.ConditionSet class

Represents a set of [conditions](./ts-res.conditions.condition.md) that must all be met in some runtime context for a resource instance to be valid.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ConditionSet implements IValidatedConditionSetDecl 
```
**Implements:** [IValidatedConditionSetDecl](./ts-res.conditions.ivalidatedconditionsetdecl.md)
